attributes.background: Theresa may has made a mockery of this country and brings us closer to the edge of oblivion than ever. Sign this to show her we want her to go.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or UK Parliament as a whole

In any case, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
